info.name: SSWM Complete API Collection
info.description:
Smart Solid Waste Management System - Complete API Collection

**Roles:**
- Block Admin: Dashboard, Reports, Vehicles, Dump Yards, Households, GP/Municipality Management
- GP/Municipality Admin: Collectors, Routes, Collection Tracking, Segregation Reports, Dump Monitoring, Vendor Coordination, GP Reports
